---
title: Lower Extremity Functional Scale (LEFS)
---




# Scoring instructions
The columns on the scale are summed to get a total score. The maximum score is 80.

# Interpretation of scores

<ul>
    <li>The lower the score the greater the disability</li>
    <li>The minimal detectable change is 9 scale points.</li>
    <li>The minimal clinically important difference is 9 scale points.</li>
    <li>% of maximal function = (LEFS score) / 80 * 100</li>
    <li></li>
</ul>



# Psychometrics

<ul>
    <li>The potential error at a given point in time was +/- 5.3 scale points.</li>
    <li>Test-retest reliability was 0.94.</li>
    <li>Construct reliability was determined by comparison with the SF-36. The scale was found to be reliable with a sensitivity to change superior to the SF-36.</li>
</ul>

<script>
// Scores for buttons
const scores = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4];

// Select all table rows
const rows = document.querySelectorAll('table.compact-table tbody tr');

// Function to update total score
function updateTotalScore() {
  let total = 0;
  for (let i = 1; i <= rows.length; i++) {
    const span = document.querySelector(`.scoreItem${i}`);
    if(span && !isNaN(parseInt(span.textContent))) {
      total += parseInt(span.textContent);
    }
  }
  const totalSpan = document.querySelector('.totalScore');
  if(totalSpan) totalSpan.textContent = total;
}

// Loop through all rows
rows.forEach((row, index) => {
  // Get the corresponding span by index (scoreItem1, scoreItem2, ...)
  const span = document.querySelector(`.scoreItem${index + 1}`);

  // Add a button for each score
  scores.forEach(score => {
    const cell = document.createElement('td');
    const btn = document.createElement('button');
    btn.textContent = score;
    btn.style.margin = '2px';
    btn.style.width = '40px';
    btn.style.backgroundColor = 'lightgray';

    btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      // Reset all buttons in this row
      row.querySelectorAll('td button').forEach(b => b.style.backgroundColor = 'lightgray');
      // Highlight clicked button
      btn.style.backgroundColor = 'green';
      // Update the corresponding span text
      if(span) {
        span.textContent = score;
      }
      // Update total score
      updateTotalScore();
    });

    cell.appendChild(btn);
    row.appendChild(cell);
  });
});

// Initialize total score in case some spans have default values
updateTotalScore();
</script>
